tool_description: Extracts contact information including phone numbers, email addresses, and agent details from property listing HTML.
error_messages: Empty HTML content: Provide valid HTML content containing contact information.
No contact information found: HTML content does not contain recognizable contact details.
usage: Provide html_content from property listings and specify which contact information types to extract.

agent_name.description: Name of the listing agent or contact person

agency_name.description: Name of the real estate agency
